channel.description: Recent content in Reproductive Technology on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Scientists Just Caught Human Embryo Implantation on Camera
item.description: Scientists recorded in 3D and in real time the exact moment a human embryo implanted itself in an artificial uterus, opening new avenues for treating infertility.
